title: Rock
description: ♥ ♥ Texas Davis (Rock) ♥ ♥Yeah, I love my MC.My life is dangerous.I’m celebrating my birthday.A sweet girl falls into my arms.Yeah, it’s great.But, she in trouble.The mob is after her.I save her.I hide her.I love her.She falls.I wonder.Who’s going save her from me. ♥ ♥ Ximena Mendez ♥ ♥I run.From the mob.They killed my sister.I’m scared.I ask for help.It’s a hot biker.He’s hot.I feel safe.I trust him.I fall hard.But he’s a biker.Can I believe his promises?My heart says yes.My soul is his. Welcome to Rock’s and Ximena’s story. Please note that this story is full of action, violence, dirty talking bad boy bikers, slang, romance, steamy scenes, and HEA.
author: P.T. Macias
